text: 64|6|Ta ejan'ya ye, tadera kache tadera rasulagana suspasta pramanadisaha asata takhana tara balata, â€˜manusa'i ki amaderake pathera sandhana debe?â€™ Atahpara tara kuphari karala o mukha phiriye nila. Allaha'o (tadera imanera byapare) kraksepahina halena; ara allaha abhabamukta, saprasansita.
